watcher_view.map: function (doc) { if(doc.source != null) { emit (doc.owner, doc.udid, doc.source); } }

updates.modify: function (doc, req) { var fields = JSON.parse(req.body); for (var i in fields) { doc[i] = fields[i] } var resp = eval(uneval(doc)); delete resp._revisions; return [doc, toJSON(resp)]; }
updates.attach: function (doc, req) { var request = JSON.parse(req.body); doc.source = request.source_id; var resp = eval(uneval(doc)); delete resp._revisions; return [doc, toJSON(resp)]; }
